Package Accessories

Class nextStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Accessories.nextStep
  • public class nextStep
extends java.util.Observable
    this class represent the Observable object of the program. the controller needs to know when another clicked is being made and get the Pixels of the click and azimut to get there this observer notify the controller about new point and azimut.
